_sText:
de_dust2_tas_remake (Original map: de_dust2)
7/1-2011

Original map made by Valve
Remake by Zynthos

This map is a remake of D2 as you already know, ive made a few but good changes that i think increases the gameplay
and make D2 more fun to play at. There a many new crates and ladders to help increase the GP. The 4 big changes are shown in the screenshots. 1:The area between CT spawn and middle
now have an extra wall and door. 2:One extra way to go from T Spawn to Bomb A, also makes camping behind the boxes harder.
3:The two closed doors at T Spawn is now opened, its good now when the CT have 1 more way to go so they can camp in there.
4:A roof and more props added that is good for camping, the roof has nothing to do with the camping of course :)

Big thanks to Valve for making this beutiful map. Special thanks to enishi_20 and badboy for helping me test the map.

If you find any bugs, please write that or send me a PM! Also add some feedback to help me increase the standard of my maps.
Feel free to remake this map but just add my name in the authors. Thanks!
